en.description:
Release Date: August 29th, 2017

Hydroid Prime is the primed variant of the Hydroid Warframe featuring more powerful stats: increased armor, energy and shield ratings, as well as an additional and polarity. It was released alongside Ballistica Prime and Nami Skyla Prime.
en.codex: Command the ocean's fury with this king of gold and silver. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

ru.description: Повелевайте яростью океана с этим королем из золота и серебра. Обладает дополнительными полярностями слотов для более тонкой настройки.
